
README

The cheat() function returns an explanation of how to solve certain Python 
assignments discussed in the "Programming for Psychological Science" taught 
in January 2022 at Universiteit van Amsterdam.  

Argument can be one of the following: 
- `"Q 1.2 P1"`   for question 1 of first week assignment
- `"Q 1.2 P10"`  for question 10 of first week assignment
- `"Q 2.2 P2"`   for question 2 of second week assignment
- `"Q 2.2 P3"`   for question 3 of second week assignment
